evidence.title: Randomized trial of metformin in older adults: effects on inflammation and functional markers
evidence.outcome_snippet: Abstract: We randomized 120 older adults to metformin or placebo and measured inflammatory markers and function over 12 months. Results showed modest changes in markers but no adverse safety signals...

raw.title: Randomized trial of metformin in older adults: effects on inflammation and functional markers
raw.abstract: We randomized 120 older adults to metformin or placebo and measured inflammatory markers and function over 12 months. Results showed modest changes in markers but no adverse safety signals.

evidence.title: Exercise intervention improves composite healthspan markers in midlife adults
evidence.outcome_snippet: Abstract: A 16-week supervised exercise program in 200 participants improved composite markers of healthspan including VO2max and insulin sensitivity...

raw.title: Exercise intervention improves composite healthspan markers in midlife adults
raw.abstract: A 16-week supervised exercise program in 200 participants improved composite markers of healthspan including VO2max and insulin sensitivity.
